meanings.definition: A plant that blooms at night.
meanings.sent1: The garden was filled with beautiful moonflowers.
meanings.sent2: I love watching the moonflowers open up as the sun sets.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat tried to catch the moonflowers as they bloomed.
meanings.sent4: The moonflowers danced in the moonlight, their petals glowing.
meanings.sent5: The fragrance of the moonflowers filled the night air, enchanting all who passed by.

meanings.definition: The flowers of a plant that blooms at night.
meanings.sent1: She picked a bouquet of fragrant moonflowers for her bedside table.
meanings.sent2: The moonflowers added a touch of magic to the garden at night.
meanings.sent3: The children pretended the moonflowers were tiny lanterns lighting their way.
meanings.sent4: The moonflowers whispered secrets to the stars as they bloomed.
meanings.sent5: The delicate petals of the moonflowers shimmered in the moonlight, a sight to behold.
